info.title: Sales Order (A2X)
info.description:
In every API call, you can make use of the following operations:

You can read entire sales orders or only parts of the data, using the provided filters.

You can create sales orders. Note that you must use “deep insert” requests (a header plus the following entities: header partner, header pricing element, header text, payment details, item, item partner, item pricing element, and item text). You cannot create entities without including any related entities.

For existing sales orders, you can create new items. Note that you must use “deep insert” requests (with the following entities: item partner, item pricing element, and item text). You cannot create entities without including any related entities.

For existing sales orders, you can update the following entities (that is, you can change the content of their properties): header, header partner, header pricing element, header text, payment plan, item, item partner, item pricing element, and item text.

For existing sales orders, you can delete the header, header partner, header pricing element, header text, payment details, item, item partner, item pricing element, and item text.

You can accept or deny approval requests for sales orders that cannot be processed without the consent of an approver.

Note: Certain elements and entities can only be used if you activate the business function ISR_RETAILSYSTEM. For more information, see Business Documentation.

x-sap-shortText: Create, read, update, and delete sales orders with this synchronous OData API

get.summary: Reads all sales order headers.
get.description: Reads the header data of all sales orders in the system.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: Filter items by property values, see [Filtering](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=64)

parameters.name: $orderby
parameters.description: Order items by property values, see [Sorting](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=65)

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

post.summary: Creates a sales order.
post.description: Creates a sales order header using deep insert requests. This means consumers can create a sales order with all possible sub-entities (for example, header partners or items).

get.summary: Reads the header of a specific sales order.
get.description: Reads the header data of a specific sales order. Consumers must pass the sales order ID (key field).

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: Select properties to be returned, see [Select](https://help.sap.com/doc/5890d27be418427993fafa6722cdc03b/Cloud/en-US/OdataV2.pdf#page=68)

patch.description: Updates the header data of a specific sales order. Consumers must pass the sales order ID (key field).

delete.description: Deletes the header data of a specific sales order. Consumers must pass the sales order ID (key field).

get.summary: Reads all items of a specific sales order.
get.description: Reads all item data of a specific sales order. Consumers must pass the sales order ID (key field).

post.summary: Creates a sales order item for a specific sales order.
post.description: Creates a sales order item for a specific sales order using deep insert requests. This means consumers can create an item with all possible sub-entities (for example, item partners or item texts).

top.name: $top

skip.name: $skip
